Injinia Geomedical bụ ọzụzụ nke na-etinye mmuta injinia n'ihe gbasara mmụta ahụike nke geology  maka ebumnuche igbochi ihe ize ndụ nke ahụike geology  nye ahụike mmadụ na anụmanụ
Injinia geomedical na-eso ndị injinia arụkọ ọrụ  na usoro iji gbochie ma ọ bụ ibelata mmetụta nke ihe gbasara ala, geochemical na geoenvironmental na ahụike mmadụ na anụmanụ
Okwu "geomedical engineering" bụ onye Pakistani geologist Dr
Atteeq-Ur-Rehman chepụtara na 2009 n'akwụkwọ ya akpọrọ "Geomedical Engineering: A new and captivating prospect"
Ụfọdụ ihe ndị na-esite n'okike dị oke ike maka ahụike mmadụ ma ọ bụrụ na erimeri  ya nke ukwuu
Ebumnuche nke ọmụmụ ihe na injinia geomedical bụ ịkọwapụta ihe ndị na-egbu egbu dị na gburugburu ebe obibi iji nagide ihe egwu na ọgbaghara ahụike na-abịa
Na mgbakwunye, injinia geomedical ga-enye usoro nkwado iji nagide ihe iyi egwu ala iji gbochie ma ọ bụ belata mmetụta ha na ahụike mmadụ na anụmanụ
Mkpa ya dị mkpa enwetala nke ukwuu n'ihi mmụba ngwa ngwa nke ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ na ọbịbịa nke nchekwa gburugburu ebe obibi
Ọ dị oke mkpa ịnweta mmata gbasara okwu a n'etiti ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị, ndị injinia, ndị ọkachamara ahụike na ọha na eze
Injinia Geomedical ga-eguzobe ma jikọta usoro injinịa na ihe gbasara ala iji megide ihe ize ndụ ahụike sitere na ihe gbasara ala na geo-environmental

Onye injinia geomedical na-akwado maapụ ụfọdụ mpaghara na-egosi oke na ihe ogbugbu nke ihe na-emebi ihe na ihe ụwa na mmiri.nwoke  ma ọ bụ nwanyị  na-aka akara ebe ndị ihe  ize ndụ dị na ndị nwere ike ịdị ize ndụ site na ịgakwuru onye ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara akụụrụ ụwa

Onye injinia ahụ ga-adụ ọdụ ma mejuputa usoro mgbake site na mgbakwunye nke ụfọdụ ihe aka mere nke ụfọdụ mineral ma ọ bụ nnu na ihe na mmiri mgbe ya na ọkachamara ahụike kwurịtara okwu, mejuputa usoro iji kwụsị mgbakwunye na-egbu egbu sitere na isi mmalite na gburugburu ebe obibi, ma chepụta ụfọdụ

mmemme ọgwụgwọ mmiri na ala iji chịkwaa ihe egwu nsi na ịkwado ọha mmadụ iji kpokọta ojiji nke akụrụngwa sitere n'okike na gburugburu ebe obibi na-adigide nke na-enyere ha aka ịmepụta nguzozi n'etiti mmadụ na geoenvironment

Ndị nyocha gbasara ọdịmma ala okwute na mmiri bụ medical Geology na-enyocha ọrụ nkume, ala, na mmiri dị n'ime ala n'ịchịkwa ahụike mmadụ na anụmanụ, ma na-atụle mmetụta gburugburu ebe obibi na nkesa ala nke nsogbu ahụike
ụwa bụ isi iyi nke ìhè a niile nke na-ekesa n'ụzọ na-adịghị mma ma na egosiputa n'ụdị kemịkal dị iche iche
Mmiri ọṅụṅụ na-aga site na nkume nakwa ala dị ka akụkụ nke usoro gburugburu mmiri
Ya mere Medical Geology na eme ihe ndị a:
